item.title: PAMAI : Passive Acoustic Monitoring Using AI
item.description: Introduction Pteropus dasymallus or flying foxes (from the {Pteropus Genus) is an insular solitary island fruit bat inhabiting the Ryukyu archipelago in Japan and some Taiwanese islands. The important and widespread decline of this species, while mostly related to habitat loss and hunting 1 2 3 , raises concern about their level of protection. Currently, $60%$ of Pteropus for which data are available are listed as vulnerable, endangered or critically endangered on the IUCN (2020) Red List4.
